welcome.speaker: Mara
welcome.text: Hello! I'm Mara, your personal guide here at DrinkMod.

welcome.speaker: Mara
welcome.text: I'm here to help you build a healthier relationship with alcohol.

welcome.speaker: Mara
welcome.text: This is a safe, private space where we'll work together to create a plan that works for you.

welcome.speaker: Mara
welcome.text: Let's start by getting to know each other a bit. What's your name, or what would you like me to call you?

introduction.speaker: Mara
introduction.text: We're going to work on moderating your alcohol consumption.

introduction.speaker: Mara
introduction.text: This is a safe place, and none of this information is shared with anyone.

motivation.speaker: Mara
motivation.text: Can you tell me why you want to moderate your consumption?

input_config.other_placeholder: Tell me in your own words...

current_patterns.speaker: Mara
current_patterns.text: Let's talk about your current drinking patterns.

current_patterns.speaker: Mara
current_patterns.text: How often do you typically drink?

current_patterns.speaker: Mara
current_patterns.text: And on days when you do drink, how much would you say you have?

favorite_drinks.speaker: Mara
favorite_drinks.text: Now let's talk about the fun part - what do you love to drink?

favorite_drinks.speaker: Mara
favorite_drinks.text: I want you to still enjoy your drinks, we're just working on control.

favorite_drinks.speaker: Mara
favorite_drinks.text: What's your go-to drink when you want to treat yourself?

favorite_drinks.speaker: Mara
favorite_drinks.text: Any other favorites? The more we know, the better I can help you plan.

schedule_recommendation.speaker: Mara
schedule_recommendation.text: Based on what you've told me, I have some recommendations.

schedule_recommendation.speaker: Mara
schedule_recommendation.text: Currently you drink {current_frequency}. Let's aim for {recommended_frequency}.

schedule_recommendation.speaker: Mara
schedule_recommendation.text: Which schedule feels right for you?

options.label: Weekends Only (Friday-Sunday)
options.description: Great for maintaining social connections while reducing overall consumption

options.label: Friday Only
options.description: Perfect for weekly celebration while maintaining clear boundaries

options.label: Social Occasions Only
options.description: Drinking becomes intentional and connected to meaningful events

options.label: Custom Weekly Pattern
options.description: Let's create a schedule that works specifically for your life

amount_preference.speaker: Mara
amount_preference.text: How many drinks would you like to limit yourself to on drinking days?

amount_preference.speaker: Mara
amount_preference.text: I recommend {recommended_amount} drinks based on your current pattern and goals.

completion.speaker: Mara
completion.text: Perfect! We've got everything set up.

completion.speaker: Mara
completion.text: Remember, this is your journey and you're in control. I'm here to support you every step of the way.

completion.speaker: Mara
completion.text: Ready to start your mindful drinking journey?
